predicate.note: Frames file for 'recalculate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'think'

example.name: all args
example.text: Analysts recalculate Cray Computer's initial book value at about $4.75 a share.

example.name: no attribute
example.text: He recalculates that the recent market slide translated into a 5% to 7% reduction in IPO proceeds to companies.
example.arg: the recent market slide translated into a 5% to 7% reduction in IPO proceeds to companies
